import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'], }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any = []; widthImg: number = 80; heightImg: number = 50; marginImg: number = 2; filtroLista: string = ''; exibirImagem: boolean = false; alterarImagem() { this.exibirImagem = !this.exibirImagem; } constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/eventos').subscribe( (response) => (this.eventos = response), (error) => console.log(error) ); } }
